name: Mini Mine Sweeper
description:
A small minesweeper clone that was built to show budding game developers how you may go about creating a small game from start to finish with creative commons license allowing them to use the project however they wish!
This project with everything included took me ~15hours to make.

I normally use GMS2 however as per this request I built this using GMS 1.4x.

2 sound effects require attribution :

UI-CLICK: RYUSA WORKS - UI Pack Vol. 1 » Click Select 3.wav

TILE-CLICK: JFRecords » UpRising1.wav
